description: You can use the AWS::Macie::Member resource to add an AWS account as a Macie member account to the current Macie master account. If the value of the Status property is not provided or is set to Created, a member account is created but not invited. If the value of the Status property is set to Invited, a member account is created and invited. A AWS::Macie::Member resource must be created with the Status property set to Invited before the AWS::Macie::Master resource can be created in a Macie member account.

message.description: The message to include with the invitation sent to the member accounts.

memberId.description: The AWS account ID of the account to designate as a member.

email.description: The email address associated with the member account.

disableEmailNotification.description: Specifies whether or not to disable email notification for the member account that you invite.

status.description: You can use the Status property to update the status of the relationship between the member account and its master account. Valid values are Created and Invited when using a AWS::Macie::Member resource. If the value for this property is not provided or set to Created, a member account is created but not invited. If the value of this property is set to Invited, a member account is created and invited.
